title: mophie Hold Force Gradient Base Case for Apple iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 7 Plus - Gold
features: Hidden, integrated magnets to work with all hold force accessories
Raised corners protect phone and improve hand feel
Bright color TPU over-molds for added protection from bumps and drops
description: A smartphone case that truly does it all, Introducing mophie base cases for the iPhone 7 Plus. With Built-in magnets, you can attach a variety of Accessories to a mophie case, transforming your smartphone into a modular, all-purpose device. Attach a Wallet to the back for everyday use. Or attach a hold force powerstation for extra battery during an evening out with friends. The mophie base case is the most useful and versatile thing your smartphone has ever seen. Protection and design is our priority. The thin and light-weight polycarbonate case has a raised bezel to provide superior edge-to-edge protection against everyday wear and tear. A rubberized, soft-touch over-mold adds durability and makes the hold force cases easy to grip and feels great in your hand.
